data.comment: The match is underway in Lisbon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Gilberto. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Benfica.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Goal! Benfica take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Haris Seferovic.
Alex Grimaldo instrumental with a fine assist.
Rui Costa signals a Benfica throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 9, In Lisbon Benfica drive forward through Everton. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica's Haris Seferovic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Belenenses.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra has run offside.
In the minute 13, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 15, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Belenenses to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Throw-in Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 19, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Benfica.
Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Belenenses's area.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Benfica's Darwin Nunez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses are pushing forward but Silvestre Varela's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, Benfica have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Miguel Cardoso for Belenenses gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 35, Rui Costa awards Benfica a goal kick.
Belenenses drive forward but Silvestre Varela is judged offside.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Benfica.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Henrique (Belenenses) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Belenenses.
Benfica's Adel Taarabt gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 43, Rui Costa signals a Belenenses throw-in in Benfica's half.
In Lisbon, Rafa Silva of Benfica is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Free kick Benfica.
In the minute 48, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Rui Costa awards Benfica a goal kick.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 49, Belenenses have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 51, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Belenenses.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Benfica surge into the attack at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica but Everton’s header is off-target.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Miguel Cardoso for Belenenses drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Belenenses.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Lisbon Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra is caught offside.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Benfica make their first substitution with Pizzi replacing Adel Taarabt.
Luca Waldschmidt is replacing Haris Seferovic for the home team.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Rui Costa signals a Belenenses throw-in in Benfica's half.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Belenenses's Silvestre Varela gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
The away team have replaced Caue with Bruno Ramires. This is the first substitution made today by Petit.
Petit is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Edi Semedo replacing Mateo Cassierra.
In the minute 64, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rui Costa blows against Benfica's Darwin Nunez for offside.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 67, Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Darwin Nunez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
In the minute 69, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in Belenenses.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Benfica.
Alex Grimaldo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
Afonso Sousa is replacing Tiago Esgaio for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 73, It seems as if Alex Grimaldo is unable to continue. Nuno Tavares replaces him for the home team.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Goal! Benfica extend their lead to 2-0 through Darwin Nunez.
Luca Waldschmidt with an assist there.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
The home team replace Rafa Silva with Pedrinho.
Jorge Jesus (Benfica) is making a fifth substitution, with Andreas Samaris replacing Everton.
In the minute 79, Belenenses have a goal kick.
Edi Semedo for the away team is judged to be offside.
Edi Semedo of Belenenses is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 82, Robinho is replacing Afonso Taira for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Richard Rodrigues is on a sub for Silvestre Varela for Belenenses.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Benfica.
Belenenses's Afonso Sousa breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Darwin Nunez for Benfica is whistled offside.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Nuno Tavares (Benfica) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Belenenses to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Benfica's Pedrinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
In the minute 89, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Rui Costa awards Belenenses a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
